I.name: Deadly Venom
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Twitch's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} apply a stack of ''Deadly Venom'' for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 6 times.

{{sbc|Deadly Venom:}} For each stack, the target is dealt{{ft|{{as|{{pp|1 to 5 for 5|1 to 17|formula=1 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% AP)}} {{sti|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} per second over the duration,|{{as|{{pp|1*6 to 5*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=1 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6}}% AP)}} {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''total''' true damage}}}} over the duration,}}for a maximum of{{ft|{{as|{{pp|1*6 to 5*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=6 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6}}% AP)}} {{as|true damage}} with each tick.|{{as|{{pp|1*6*6 to 5*6*6 for 5|1 to 17|formula=6 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|(+ {{#expr:2.5*6*6}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' true damage}} over the duration.}}This effect is considered a {{tip|poison}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Twitch's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack of Deadly Venom for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 6 times.

Deadly Venom: For each stack, the target is dealtfor a maximum ofThis effect is considered a poison.
I.notes:
* The first 5 stacks on a target are indicated each by a small mark around them, while a target affected by the maximum stacks of 6 is indicated by a single large mark above them instead.
* ''Deadly Venom'' does not affect [[structures]].
* Being applied on-hit, ''Deadly Venom'' stacks will still be applied if the attack was {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or {{tip|blocked}}, but not if {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Twitch''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

Q1.name: Ambush
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a 1 second delay, '''Twitch''' becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} for a duration. Attacking or casting ''{{ai|Venom Cask|Twitch}}'' or ''{{ai|Contaminate|Twitch}}'' ends ''Ambush'' immediately.
During this time, '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} while facing enemy {{tip|champions}} within a 1000-unit radius who cannot see him.
Upon breaking stealth, '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
When an enemy {{tip|champion}} dies while afflicted with ''{{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}'', ''Ambush's'' cooldown is {{sti|cdr|reset}}.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes camouflaged for a duration. Attacking or casting Twitch's Venom Cask or Twitch's Contaminate ends Ambush immediately.
During this time, Twitch gains 10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% while facing enemy champions within a 1000-unit radius who cannot see him.
Upon breaking stealth, Twitch gains bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
When an enemy champion dies while afflicted with Twitch's Deadly Venom, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
Q1.notes:
* Entering stealth cancels '''Twitch's''' current basic attack.
* ''Ambush'' follows the same rules as stealth but he can still perform actions normally before entering {{tip|camouflage}}. Activating {{si|Recall}} during the 1-second delay allows him to {{tip|channel}} it while stealthed.
* If '''Twitch''' enters {{tip|stasis}} during the delay, he will gain the {{tip|camouflage}} after the stasis ends.

W.name: Venom Cask
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' hurls a cask of venom that explodes at the target location, applying ''{{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}'' to enemies hit and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area.
The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a ''{{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}'' stack each second to enemies within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes at the target location, applying Twitch's Deadly Venom to enemies hit and granting sight of the area.
The area then becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a Twitch's Deadly Venom stack each second to enemies within and slowing them.
W.notes:
* ''Venom Cask'' can apply a maximum of 4 {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks per enemy.
* ''Venom Cask's'' missile will fail to fire if '''Twitch''' is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} during the cast time.{{bug|2}}

E.name: Contaminate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by ''{{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}'', dealing each of them {{as|physical damage}} at the end of the cast time.
''Contaminate'' deals additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|33% AP}} {{as|magic damage}} for each stack of ''{{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}'' on the target.
''A nearby enemy with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be affected.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by Twitch's Deadly Venom, dealing each of them physical damage at the end of the cast time.
Contaminate deals additional physical damage and 33% AP magic damage for each stack of Twitch's Deadly Venom on the target.
A nearby enemy with Twitch's Deadly Venom is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be affected.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Stack|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minimum Mixed Damage|{{ap|20+15 to 60+35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 33% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Damage|{{ap|20+15*6 to 60+35*6}} {{as|(+ 210% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|33*6}}% AP)}}}}
E.notes:
* '''Twitch''' is given a range indicator for ''Contaminate's'' radius upon infecting an enemy champion with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} (actual range is slightly larger than shown by the indicator).
* ''Contaminate'' will not damage enemy targets whose {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks wear off or if they move out of ''Contaminate's'' range before the cast time completes.
** If the target moves out of range after the cast time, the missile will still hit and deal damage.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage Per Stack: (+ 35% bonus AD)
  • Minimum Mixed Damage: (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 33% AP)
  • Maximum Mixed Damage: (+ 210% bonus AD) (+ % AP)

R.name: Spray and Pray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 6 seconds, during which his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} are replaced by ''bolts'' that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to {{tt|every enemy unit|non-champions and champions, wards and plants, turrets and structures}} hit.

The ''bolts'' deal {{pp|key=%|type=enemies hit|110-10*x|0 to 4 for 5|formula=100% - 10% per enemy hit. ''This is capped at 60% damage.''|changedisplay=true}} of the {{as|attack's damage|AD}}, apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness, and can {{tip|critically strike}}.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Twitch gains bonus attack damage and 300 bonus attack range for 6 seconds, during which his basic attacks are replaced by bolts that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, dealing damage to every enemy unit hit.
The bolts deal 0 to 4 for 5 ‒ undefined of the attack's damage, apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness, and can critically strike.
R.notes:
* The extra distance that the bolts travel scales with '''bonus''' attack range.
* ''Spray and Pray'' allows '''Twitch''' to outrange {{tip|turret|turrets}} by 50 units, allowing him to hit them without them returning fire.
* '''Twitch''' targets his line attack at his target's location at the ''start'' of his attack windup.
** The ''bolts'' reach targets at a delay, composed of '''Twitch's''' windup time and distance the ''bolt'' has to travel at finite speed. Even the primary target can dodge the attack if they are moving quickly enough.
* The ''bolt'' projectiles will naturally pass through terrain and enemy structures (the latter will be damaged by ''bolts'' even if they are not directly targeted).
* If '''Twitch''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} before winding up the attack, the hits will ''miss'' against '''all''' targets.
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} interacts with ''Spray and Pray's'' {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} but not with the modified missile effect (the secondary bolts will not have pass-through effects).
* Whenever the ''bolts'' penetrate a target, a small elongated cloud appears at the location, which's VFX and SFX '''can''' be seen and heard inside the Fog of War.
* The ''bolts<nowiki>'</nowiki>'' travel distance scales with the full value of '''Twitch's''' {{sti|range|attack range}} increases such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}, but not with size increases (which only increase his effective attack range, thereby the target range).
* (Outdated as of [[V10.13]], now can hit everything with edge range, except for turrets) The {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center of a unit must be within the maximum travel distance of the ''bolt'' missile, and in front of the spawn location ('''Twitch's''' {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center) for the ''bolt'' to be able to hit them.
** Other than this condition, the ''bolt'' missile has to only touch (pass within its half width of 60 units) the {{tip|er|icononly = true}} edge of the unit's radius.
** This is standard behaviour for ''linear skillshots''.
